XPERIENCE FANTASYBAT FANTASY: ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM, CONQUER VICTORIES IMMERSE IN FANTASYBAT FANTASY: FORM YOUR TEAM, CLAIM TRIUMPHS DIVE INTO FANTASYBAT FANTASY: CREATE YOUR TEAM, CELEBRATE VICTORIES ENGAGE IN FANTASYBAT FANTASY: DRAFT YOUR TEAM, SECURE VICTORIES PARTICIPATE IN FANTASYBAT FANTASY: BUILD YOUR TEAM, EARN VICTORIES FAQs How to deposit funds in your fantasy wallet? Add funds using methods such as UPI payments, cards, and net banking. Your transactions will be instantly reflected in your Fantacrick fantasy wallet. How to withdraw fantasy winnings? Withdrawing your fantasy winnings is easy. Transfer them to your PayTm wallet or bank account with just a tap. Ensure your registered number matches your PayTm account for instant cashouts. How can fantasy rewards be used? Your fantasy rewards can be used to enter various fantasy leagues. The amount of rewards usable in each league is indicated, allowing you to strategize your gameplay. What happens to fantasy stakes in a canceled match? In the event of a canceled match, refunds are processed immediately, ensuring your stakes are returned without delay. pages.privacy-policy: FantasyBat Privacy Policy FantasyBat FantasyBat Privacy Policy FantasyBat Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how FantasyBat ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Website"). It also describes the choices you have associated with your data and how you can contact us. Information We Collect We collect several types of information for various purposes to improve your experience on the Website. Personal Information: This may include your name, email address, username, password (in hashed form), demographic information (e.g., country), and any other information you voluntarily provide. Usage Data: This may include information about how you access and use the Website, such as the pages you visit, the features you use, the time and duration of your visit, and your IP address. Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and store certain information. These technologies may help us remember your preferences, understand how you use the Website, and improve your overall experience. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To provide and maintain the Website To improve and personalize your experience on the Website To send you administrative communications, such as password reset emails To respond to your inquiries and requests For internal purposes, such as analytics, fraud prevention, and research To comply with legal obligations Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who help us operate the Website and provide services to you (e.g., data storage, marketing). These service providers will only use your information in accordance with our instructions and applicable privacy laws. We may also disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or if we believe such disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others. Your Choices You have certain choices regarding your information: Access and Update Your Information: You can access and update your personal information through your account settings. Cookies and Tracking: You can control or opt out of cookies and similar tracking technologies by adjusting your browser settings. However, doing so may limit your ability to use certain features of the Website. Data Deletion: You may have the right to request that we delete your personal information. Please contact us if you wish to exercise this right. Data Retention We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Children's Privacy Our Website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. We will take steps to remove the information from our servers. Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on the Website. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. FantasyBat Phone: +912835996724 E-mail: fantasybat@gmail.com Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy This Website is only for 18+ users.
